name: Hydra-Essentiel Bi-Phase Serum
description: Bi-phase Serum boosts skin's natural hydration, leaving it soft, visibly plump, radiant, and intensely hydrated. It contains organic leaf of life, which is a super-quenching succulent plant extract that revitalizes the skin's natural hydration to retain moisture in any environment. The formula perfectly preps skin to accept the full benefits of your Hydra-Essentiel moisturizers and protect against the elements.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: Ultimune Power Infusing Serum Concentrate
description: This serum defends against visible signs of aging for skin that’s up to 28 percent stronger in one week*. The lightweight formula sinks in quickly, leaving skin looking plump, radiant, and youthful. It’s the winner of 200 beauty awards globally, and one is sold every 6.8 seconds.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free

name: Capture Youth Redness Soother Serum
description: Capture Youth offers five targeted serums to meet the specific needs of each skin type. Enriched with antioxidant-rich iris extract, each serum is infused with a naturally-derived active ingredient to target and treat a specific skin concern: dullness, dryness, lack of firmness, oily skin, and redness. These serums are formulated to be used with the universal antioxidant cream for maximum efficacy.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free

name: Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Advanced Face Serum
description: This serum rapidly restores visible resilience and leaves skin comfortably calm. It contains reishi mushroom, sea buckthorn, and fermented chaga, which reduce visible redness and nourish skin. The serum also leaves sensitive skin calm and comforted.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free

name: Avocado Ceramide Redness Relief Serum
description: Skin-soothing serum made of antioxidant rich avocado and ceramides to help reduce the look of redness and irritation caused by dehydration and a weak skin barrier.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free

name: Mega-Bright Dark Spot Correcting Serum
description: An advanced serum with plant saccharides and 15 percent vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to visibly minimize pores, brighten dark spots, and target signs of aging.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Acne Solutions Acne + Line Correcting Serum
description: This gentle, hydrating formula helps clear and treat acne without dryness or irritation. Potent antiaging technology improves the appearance of lines, wrinkles, and texture while visibly lifting skin. See skin that’s clear, smooth, and youthful-looking.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Vinopure Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum
description: A cleanly formulated serum for acne-prone skin with 100 percent natural salicylic acid and niacinamide to address blackheads, breakouts, pores, and excess oil. Now in more sustainable packaging, this 97 percent-natural, lightweight serum is ideal for acne-prone skin. It visibly improves texture, minimizes pores and excess oil, and reduces blemishes. It is also free of fragrance and noncomedogenic.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Serum Hydralife Sorbet
description: This multi-benefit serum enriched with natural ingredients—including mallow flower and haberlea leaf—offers three actions in one single step. The ultra-concentrated moisturizing of a serum, the brightening radiance boost of a gentle peel, and the instant toning effect of a lotion. Its translucent blue, hydrating liquid texture gives the skin an instant splash of freshness. Day after day, skin is left fresh, radiant, and revitalized.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Oil Control Serum
description: Niacinamide (vitamin B3) reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion. A high 10 percent concentration of this vitamin is supported in the formula by zinc PCA to balance visible aspects of sebum activity. This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without alcohol, silicone, nuts, gluten, and fragrance.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Buffet + Copper Peptides 1%
description: A multi-technology peptide serum that targets various visible signs of aging. For Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops
description: Unleash a dewy glow with this versatile skincare and makeup hybrid. This lightweight gel delivers a glow quickly and over time for a reflective complexion with or without makeup. Use it as a hydrating, visibly brightening, and highlighting serum for all skin types before moisturizer or as the last step of your routine for a glossy finish. This product is ophthalmologist tested.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Glowy Makeup Serum
description: Unleash a dewy glow with this versatile skincare and makeup hybrid. This lightweight gel delivers a glow quickly and over time for a reflective complexion with or without makeup. Use it as a hydrating, visibly brightening, and highlighting serum for all skin types before moisturizer or as the last step of your routine for a glossy finish. This product is ophthalmologist tested.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Vinosource Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: This lightweight, water-based serum provides antioxidant hydration all day long. Hyaluronic acid intensely hydrates while Prebiotic Grape water nourishes the moisture barrier to replenish skin's microbiome and reveal healthier-looking skin. Now cleaner and silicone-free in new sustainable packaging!
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Capture Totale Super Potent Age-Defying Intense Serum
description: A powerful, age-defying serum that visibly plumps, firms, and adds radiance in as little as one week.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Water Bank Hydro Essence
description: Water Bank Hydro Essence is created with highly-concentrated green mineral water and infused with vitamin-rich kale, watercress, and beet to provide intense hydration. It is light and fast-absorbing to help boost the benefits of this formula.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum
description: A trailblazing, cutting-edge formula—designed with an expert panel of scientists and dermatologists—that’s super concentrated with visibly age-diminishing ingredients like CL1870 Laser Focus Complex, an expert peptide-rich blend, plus a potent retinoid and hyaluronic acid.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Double Serum Complete Anti-Aging Concentrate
description: his innovative dual serum successfully combines 21 potent, visibly youth-boosting plant extracts—both water- and oil-soluble—to ensure a perfect affinity with your skin. It is enriched with turmeric to fight signs of aging, effectively targeting lines and wrinkles, evening out the appearance of skin tone, and boosting visible radiance.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 Hydrating Serum
description: This formulation combines low, medium, and high molecular weight hyaluronic acid, as well as a next-generation H.A. crosspolymer at a combined concentration of two percent for multi-depth hydration. This system is supported with the addition of B5 for enhanced hydration.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: GinZing Into the Glow Brightening Serum
description: This fast-acting formula includes Origin‘s 5% Retexturizing Complex, a green coffee seed and AHA/BHA blend that supports cell turnover for smooth, poreless-looking skin. It‘s also infused with potent vitamin C and hydrating hyaluronic acid to visibly brighten and plump dull-looking skin for radiance that‘s real.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Foam
description: A cleansing foam formulated for acne-prone skin that helps clear and target the look of blemishes and pores.This daily cleanser with two percent salicylic acid removes dirt and excess oil. It also helps clear pores for healthier-looking skin.
ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free, Oil Free

name: Hydra Life Lotion To Foam Fresh Cleanser
description: This gentle cleanser effectively removes makeup as it cleanses, purifies, refreshes, and tones the skin. With just one pump, the fresh watery lotion transforms into an airy foam. Highly concentrated with natural white tea leaf extract, the formula removes impurities and leaves the skin toned and refreshed for a perfectly clean and clear complexion.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Future Solution LX Extra Rich Cleansing Foam
description: This dermatologist-tested, luxurious foaming cleanser with anti-aging ingredients effectively removes impurities while retaining skin’s essential moisture, leaving skin fresh and smooth-looking. It prepares the skin to better absorb benefits of following skincare treatments.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Cream Skin Milk Oil Cleanser
description: A low-pH 5.5 cleanser that gently melts away makeup and impurities leaving skin feeling soft and refreshed without being stripped of moisture.
ingredients: Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: The Cleansing Foam
description: A gentle cleanser that purifies even delicate, sensitive skin, drawing out impurities and excess oil, leaving skin soft, hydrated, and healthy looking.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap
description: This liquid facial soap cleanses with a soft, non-drying lather to loosen surface flakes, removes dirt and debris, and protects skin’s natural moisture balance. The quick-rinsing formula leaves skin clean, comfortable, refreshed, and never taut or dry. It also preps skin for the exfoliating action of Step Two, Clarifying Lotion.
ingredients: Redness, Fragrance Free, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: Clarifying Cleansing Foam
description: This rich foaming cleanser contains micro white powder and white clay to effectively remove excess skin-dulling surface cells, pollutants, and oxidized substances. Formulated for all skin types and featuring internal power resist technology, this cleanser helps remove impurities while softening and visibly strengthening skin. It is to be used daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare regimen.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Squalane Cleanser
description: This gentle cleansing product is formulated to target makeup removal while leaving the skin feeling smooth and moisturized.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
description: All of the ingredients in the Gentle Foaming Cleanser are sustainably farmed from Le Domaine Clarins—Clarins’s open-air laboratory in the French Alps. It’s formulated with vegetal squalane to help protect the skin from the drying effects of hard water and moringa extract, which eliminates pollution.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Vinoclean Cleansing Micellar Water
description: A soap-free, no-rinse micellar water that removes makeup, cleanses, hydrates, and soothes skin in one step for a fresh, clean complexion.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Multi Deep-Clean Cleanser
description: This deep-cleaning cleanser contains cellulose beads to gently remove dead skin cells for a refreshed feeling and no tightness on the skin. Blueberry extract and papain enzyme help skin feel healthy and supple. As an added benefit, palm oil works to lightly remove remaining makeup.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Moisturizing Cream Cleanser
description: This mild formula includes sunflower seed oil to moisturize and improve skin texture and meadowfoam seed oil to soften and soothe for a balanced complexion and long-lasting hydration.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Ceramidin Facial Barrier Mask
description: An intensely moisturizing sheet mask for dry and damaged skin that helps support the skin barrier with 5-Cera Complex, ectoin, and peptide complex.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: White Lucent Power Brightening Mask
description: This rejuvenating mask is inspired by iontophoresis, a beauty treatment that saturates skin with a generous amount of brightening ingredients. Through the power of Ion Force Technology, the brightening ingredients are absorbed deep within the skin for highly effective results. Remove the mask and see a refreshed, bright, and even skin tone.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Treatment Lotion Hydrating Mask
description: This innovative sheet mask is infused with almost a full ounce of The Treatment Lotion’s energizing vitality in each application. It is made with Japanese skin-hugging technology and millions of micro-fibers that deliver hydration to the skin.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Hypoallergenic Cica Sleeping Mask
description: This overnight mask is formulated with LANEIGE's proprietary Forest Yeast Extract, which is more effective than madecassoside used in traditional Cica products. Applied before bed, it provides deep nourishment during the hours when skin is more vulnerable due to loss of moisture.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Instant Detox Mask
description: See de-stressed skin in as little as 10 minutes with this natural clay mask. Free of silicone and fragrance and suitable for all skin types, it draws out impurities and excess sebum to leave texture visibly refined, pores visibly tightened, and the complexion looking luminous.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Vinosource-Hydra Moisturizing Mask
description: This rich, dewy rescue mask for dry skin has grape water that soothes any visible redness while calming Centella asiatica replenishes skin's moisture barrier. Ideal for sensitive skin, it is safe to use as an eye mask or leave overnight for intense hydration.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Salicylic Acid 2% Masque
description: Infused with charcoal and clays, this mask enhances the look of smoothness and clarity while leaving skin feeling refreshed. It also removes dead cells from the surface of oily and blemish-prone skin to reveal more visibly radiant skin beneath.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial Mask
description: Unlike traditional drying clay masks, this facial decongests pores while delivering maximum hydration with hyaluronic-infused clay. Paired with pore-purifying BHA, smoothing PHA, brightening watermelon enzymes/extract, & micro-exfoliating blueberry seed powder, this mask unveils clear, baby-soft skin in 5 minutes.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores
description: Nature's complexion clean-up crew clears the way for skin to act its best. Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask helps flush out environmental toxins, dirt, and debris that can clog pores and cause skin to look dull—leaving the complexion clarified, refreshed, and healthier-looking. Bamboo charcoal removes excess oil that could lead to blackheads, white China clay absorbs environmental toxins and lecithin dissolves impurities.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Shake & Shot Rubber Masks
description: Dr.Jart uses the same rubber mask technique found in high-end Korean spas to achieve equivalent high-performance results—without the fuss of mixing a traditional modeling pack. The innovative cream-to-sheet formula penetrates skin more deeply than a sheet mask to deliver high-potency active ingredients. Each freshly-made mask penetrates skin surface to deliver the benefits your skin needs most quickly and effectively.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay
description: Made with Mediterranean rose clay, Canadian willowherb, and exfoliating jojoba beads, it helps gently deep clean while refining skin's texture. Pores appear to vanish and clarity is restored for a radiant youthful-looking complexion that's silky-smooth to the touch.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Rouge Dior Refillable Lip Balm
description: This lip balm offers up to 24 hours of hydration with a formula enriched with extract of peony and pomegranate flower for lips that appear soothed and more beautiful day after day.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Superbalm Lip Treatment
description: Deeply hydrating balm that helps to repair distressed lips and replenishes moisture loss.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Succulent Lip Balm
description: This lip balm works to moisturize dry, chapped lips. It has a refreshing scent and flavor and leaves lips super-comforted. It also comes packaged in a seasonal succulent.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Lip Glowy Balm
description: The perfect daytime partner in crime to the cult-favorite Lip Sleeping Mask, Glowy Lip Balm is pocket sized for easy, on-the-go application. The formula contains murumuru and shea butters that provide powerful hydration and lock in moisture longer.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Lip Conditioner
description: Concentrated with moisturizing active ingredients plus antioxidant grape polyphenols and repairing apricot oil, this balm leaves lips soft, repaired, and protected.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Resveratrol Lift Firming Eye Gel-Cream
description: A visibly firming and depuffing gel eye cream that visibly reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Powered by peptides, it smooth and redefines the eye contour’s appearance and is formulated without fragrance for the delicate eye area.

name: All About Eyes Rich Eye Cream
description: This moisture-rich eye cream diminishes the look of under-eye circles, shadows, fine lines—instantly and over time. It de-puffs, calms with moisture, strengthens skin's moisture barrier against common irritants, and is ophthalmologist tested.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Bright Eyes Collagen-Infused Brightening Colloidal Silver Eye Masks
description: These masks are formulated with pure colloidal silver which helps nurture skin to give the look of up to 10 hours of rest. The illuminating pearl helps eyes appear brighter while natural collagen helps firm and tighten the look of skin. These masks may also be used on nose-to-mouth area.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Cooling Water Eye Patches
description: Chill out and relax your tired under eyes with Cooling Water Eye Patches. They’re formulated with aloe and lavender to calm and hydrate the under-eye area. The silicone-free, fabric patches won’t slip or slide down your face, so you can bring them out anywhere.

name: Ceramidin Eye Cream
description: A rich, non-greasy eye cream with ceramides and niacinamide to intensely moisturize and smooth your dry, delicate under-eye area for a bright, awake look.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Watermelon Glow AHA Pink Dream Body Cream
description: This cream is infused with a watermelon scent and includes holy grail actives, like moisturizing watermelon seed butter and exfoliating hibiscus AHA, traditionally used for facial care. It creates hydrated, smooth, and glowing skin without silicone or leaving a sticky feel.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Ceramidin Body Lotion
description: A comfortable, lightweight body lotion that absorbs fully and packs in five kinds of ceramides for long-lasting hydration. Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

name: Deep Comfort Body Butter
description: So silky, skin drinks it up instantly, this moisturizer penetrates dryness-prone skin, delivering a new kind of softness to elbows, knees, heels. It absorbs easily, providing instant comfort and hydration so that skin stays soothed and comforted all day.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: Honey Drop Face Moisturizer
description: A super-lightweight yet intensely hydrating honey face moisturizer to keep skin plump with hydration. Formulated with antioxidant-rich honey, hyaluronic acid and golden cupuaçu butter beads to nourish skin.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free, Parabens Free

name: Seaberry Restorative Body Cream
description: Rich with omegas 3,6, 7, and 9, this moisturizing formula hydrates and nourishes extra dry skin, calming and relieving irritation. Fortified with seaberry oil, also known as seabuckthorn oil, cranberry seed oil, and sal seed butter, these ingredients help to restore, protect, and soften the skin.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Extra-Firming Body Lotion
description: This soft, melting lotion surrounds the body with freshness. Energizing and firming plant extracts restore the appearance of skin's youthful density and elasticity, creating a younger, firmer, more lifted look. This soft, melting lotion surrounds the body with freshness. Energizing and firming plant extracts restore the appearance of skin's youthful density and elasticity, creating a younger, firmer, more lifted look.

name: Peony & Blush Suede Body Creme
description: This rich Body Crème is formulated with conditioning oils of jojoba seed, cocoa seed, and sweet almond oils to help hydrate, nourish, and protect the skin, while the delicious fragrance leaves your body scented all over. The essence of charm, this scent captures exquisitely fragile peonies in voluptuous bloom. A flirtatious, juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose, and gillyflower mingle with the sensuality of soft, blush suede for a luxurious and seductive trail.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: The Body Creme
description: Like a nurturing seaweed wrap, this rich body cream rescues dry skin with long-lasting, thorough hydration. Crafted with La Mer’s Blue Algae Lift Ferment, this treatment helps promote an overall firmer look and feel. Skin is calmed as it is enveloped in the soothing benefits of the sea.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Orange Blossom Body Lotion
description: Enriched with coconut oil, this Body & Hand Lotion is readily absorbed to hydrate and condition upon application, while its fragrance-diffusing properties help to radiate scent from the skin.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones

name: Citron de Vigne Body Lotion
description: The sun-drenched days, earthy vines, and sparkling wines of France's Champagne region were the inspiration for the notes in this intoxicating, effervescent scent. An innovative heart note of a pinot noir accord—comprised of bergamot, dark almond, musk, white sandalwood, and rose—is combined with bubbling citrus top notes and an earthy base, resulting in a crisp and sensual blend ideal for both men and women.
ingredients: Vegan, Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Cruelty Free

name: Honey Body Butter Ultra-Hydrating Body Cream
description: This body cream leaves skin with a silky-smooth finish and a healthy-looking glow. Known for its soothing and humectant properties, buckwheat honey moisturizes and nourishes. Cupuaçu, cacao, and mango butters restore hydration and soften skin. Never feels heavy, greasy, or sticky.

name: Ginger Souffle Body Cream

name: Body Lotion

name: Resurface+ Glycolic and Lactic Acid Renewing Body Scrub
description: A double-duty body peel with glycolic and lactic acids to visibly polish, refine, brighten, and smooth crepey skin with roughness and bumps even keratosis pilaris.

name: Sparkle Skin Body Exfoliator
description: A gel-based formula that whisks away surface dryness.

name: Body Polishing Scrub
description: This Body Polishing Scrub by Moroccanoil Body contains argan shell powder and lava stone pumice to gently exfoliate plus a blend of six precious oils to nurture and hydrate. It is also fragranced with the Moroccanoil signature scent and gentle enough to use two to three times a week.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Parabens Free

name: Brown Sugar Body Polish Exfoliator
description: Fresh pioneered the use of sugar as a non-drying exfoliator with this this moisturizing body scrub and it's still unrivaled for silky soft skin. Brown sugar crystals are natural humectants that prevent moisture loss, which gently remove dry skin, while the precious oils nourish.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Parabens Free

name: Crushed Cabernet Body Scrub
description: This natural, wine-inspired body scrub provides strong exfoliation, drains, refines, softens, and nourishes the skin as it imparts intense hydration and a satiny finish. Skin is left smooth and silky.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Parabens Free

name: Ultimate Body Scrub Soap
description: This highly efficient scrub soap, made with sloughing, natural oat bran, oat kernel, and pumice, thoroughly cleanses skin and facilitates the exfoliation of dead surface cells—helping to alleviate roughness on tougher areas such as elbows and heels. A refreshing scent invigorates the senses for a perfect cleansing ritual.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Parabens Free

name: Hand and Nail Cream
description: Concentrated with moisturizing active ingredients plus antioxidant grape polyphenols and reparative organic fair trade shea butter, this Hand and Nail Cream leaves skin soft and nourished. Its delicately perfumed, rich texture is instantly absorbed into skin.

name: Make A Difference Rejuvenating Hand Treatment
description: Make A Difference Rejuvenating Hand Treatment is infused with self-hydrating rose of Jericho and skin-reviving trehalose and sea haricots, which work hand-in-hand to help skin recover from dramatic dryness. The ancient oceanic flora helps repair damage caused by UV exposure, and scutellaria extract helps to even out skin tone. Meadowfoam seed oil lavishes hands with long-lasting smoothness that's never greasy, leaving an elegant, silky feel on skin.
ingredients: Alcohol Free, No Silicones, Parabens Free

name: Hand and Nail Treatment Cream
description: Get smooth, soft hands and tough, strong nails with this lightweight cream. The nourishing formula absorbs quickly to deeply invigorate and tone skin. Shea protects skin against the drying effects of external factors while minimizing visible signs of aging.

name: Vitamin E Nourishing Hand Treatment Cream
description: Rich and sumptuous to the touch, this cream conditions the skin while providing formidable environmental protection. A hint of pomelo and cassis leaves hands deliciously scented.

name: Moisturizing Hand Cream
description: A fast-absorbing, nourishing cream with shea butter that softens hands and protects against dryness for 24-hour hydration while leaving a subtle but iconic Fresh scent.

name: Eczema+ Hand Repair Cream
description: The ultimate relief for extremely dry, cracked, irritated skin and eczema on hands and feet, this sensitive-skin-safe cream visibly restores the skin barrier with three active pharmaceutical ingredients (FDA and Health Canada approved), a blend of supportive botanicals, rich natural butters, and emollient oils.
